usage: exercise and resistance training for fitness classes, home gym, or workout area
key_features: Printed weight number on end caps
ai_description: Two vibrant pink dumbbells with a matte, non-slip neoprene coating rest on a clean white surface. Each hexagonal-shaped weight features crisp white 'KAKSS' branding and '1 KG' markings on the end caps. The distinctive hexagonal design provides stability, preventing rolling when placed on flat surfaces. The product appears new and is presented with a quality seal guaranteeing non-toxic materials.
target_audience: home fitness enthusiasts, people with limited space
